trans-unit.source: How to Deliver Streaming Content from Media Services
trans-unit.target: How to Deliver Streaming Content from Media Services

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a locator that is used to build a streaming URL.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a locator that is used to build a streaming URL.

trans-unit.source: Code samples are written in C# and use the Media Services SDK for .NET.
trans-unit.target: Code samples are written in C# and use the Media Services SDK for .NET.

trans-unit.source: You can stream an adaptive bitrate MP4 set by creating an OnDemand streaming locator and building a streaming URL.
trans-unit.target: You can stream an adaptive bitrate MP4 set by creating an OnDemand streaming locator and building a streaming URL.

trans-unit.source: The [encoding an asset](media-services-encode-asset.md) topic shows how to encode into an adaptive bitrate MP4 set.
trans-unit.target: The [encoding an asset](media-services-encode-asset.md) topic shows how to encode into an adaptive bitrate MP4 set.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]If your content is encrypted, configure asset delivery policy (as described in [this](media-services-dotnet-configure-asset-delivery-policy.md) topic) before creating a locator.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]If your content is encrypted, configure asset delivery policy (as described in [this](media-services-dotnet-configure-asset-delivery-policy.md) topic) before creating a locator.

trans-unit.source: You can also use an OnDemand streaming locator to build URLs that point to MP4 files that can be progressively downloaded.
trans-unit.target: You can also use an OnDemand streaming locator to build URLs that point to MP4 files that can be progressively downloaded.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to create an OnDemand streaming locator in order to publish your asset and build a Smooth, MPEG DASH, and HLS streaming URLs.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to create an OnDemand streaming locator in order to publish your asset and build a Smooth, MPEG DASH, and HLS streaming URLs.

trans-unit.source: It also shows hot to build progressive download URLs.
trans-unit.target: It also shows hot to build progressive download URLs.

trans-unit.source: To create the OnDemand streaming locator and get URLs you need to do the following:
trans-unit.target: To create the OnDemand streaming locator and get URLs you need to do the following:

trans-unit.source: If the content is encrypted, define an access policy.
trans-unit.target: If the content is encrypted, define an access policy.

trans-unit.source: If you plan to stream, get the streaming manifest file (.ism) in the asset.
trans-unit.target: If you plan to stream, get the streaming manifest file (.ism) in the asset.

trans-unit.source: Build URLs to the manifest file or MP4 files.
trans-unit.target: Build URLs to the manifest file or MP4 files.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]You can also stream your content over an SSL connection.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]You can also stream your content over an SSL connection.

trans-unit.source: To do this, make sure your streaming URLs start with HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: To do this, make sure your streaming URLs start with HTTPS.

trans-unit.source: The following code calls .NET SDK extensions methods that create a locator and generate the Smooth Streaming, HLS and MPEG-DASH URLs for adaptive streaming.
trans-unit.target: The following code calls .NET SDK extensions methods that create a locator and generate the Smooth Streaming, HLS and MPEG-DASH URLs for adaptive streaming.
